summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6172 for the improvement of 41st Avenue South from Court Street to Andover Street; by constructing sanitary sewers, etc.; under Ordinance No. 86625, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
